dcterms:description: The WMT19 official English-German APE dataset consists of a training and development set for the Automatic Post-Editing task.
dcterms:title: WMT19 English-German APE dataset

dcterms:description: The eSCAPE-NMT dataset is used as additional training data for the Automatic Post-Editing task, with sentence triplets extracted based on specific criteria.
dcterms:title: eSCAPE-NMT dataset
